hero.note: Powered by Tismodev: strategy, design, code and SEO wrapped into one dependable studio.

stats.discord: Active Discord bots (tickets, roles, moderation + custom modules)
stats.responsive: Responsive websites in HTML • CSS • JavaScript • Tailwind • React/Next.js • PHP

stack.title: Core capabilities
stack.description: Front-end in HTML/CSS/JavaScript, React, Next.js plus lightweight PHP back-ends, API integrations, workflow automation and responsive UI for marketing sites and communities.
stack.note: I handle discovery, design, development, documentation and long-term support.

services.title: Services to move your product forward
services.subtitle: Results-driven packages for professional websites, Discord automation and technical maintenance.

bot.title: Professional Discord bots
bot.desc: Ticketing, auto roles, admin commands and API integrations tailored to your community.

web.title: Website & landing page builds
web.desc: Custom marketing sites and landing pages in HTML/CSS/JS or React/Next.js with analytics, lightweight PHP integrations and SEO baked in.

automation.title: SEO & technical setup
automation.desc: Full SEO setup, hosting, custom domain configuration and Search Console monitoring for fast indexing.

faq.title: SEO & launch questions
faq.subtitle: Understand how I secure your domain, improve search visibility and keep indexing on track.
faq.q1: How do you make sure my site gets indexed fast?
faq.a1: I connect your custom domain, enforce HTTPS redirects, submit the sitemap and monitor Google Search Console until pages are live.
faq.q2: Can you improve SEO on an existing site?
faq.a2: Yes. I audit your pages, fix metadata, enhance content, and configure analytics tools without breaking the current design.
faq.q3: What's included in your SEO support?
faq.a3: Custom domain setup, precise metadata, Open Graph tags, JSON-LD schemas and optional monthly tracking depending on your needs.

projects.title: Websites & Discord bots delivered
projects.subtitle: Selected projects showing how design, code and automation drive community and business goals.

asbl.title: Non-profit website • Donations & newsletter
asbl.desc: Responsive showcase site highlighting the mission, collecting donations and syncing newsletter sign-ups.

tismotranslate.title: TismoTranslate • AI Multilingual Translator
tismotranslate.desc: Intelligent translator powered by Gemini Flash API, supporting many languages with register adaptation (casual, standard, formal, professional).

discord.title: Discord bot for pro servers
discord.desc: Automated tickets, role management, transcripts and search interface for support teams.

salon.title: Hair salon website • Booking & announcements
salon.desc: Full-featured site with public hours, story, pricing grid, multi-photo gallery, booking form, calendar and admin news/closures.

process.title: Workflow
process.subtitle: Discovery, prototyping and delivery with continuous support for your website or Discord bot.

step1.title: Discovery & scope
step1.desc: Audit requirements, target audience and success metrics to build a clear action plan.

step2.title: Prototype & iterations
step2.desc: Interactive prototype validated together before full development and automation setup.

step3.title: Delivery & support
step3.desc: Production launch, documentation and ongoing maintenance with a 72h SLA.

contact.title: Ready to launch your site or bot?
contact.subtitle: Pick your channel and launch with Tismodev. Fast quotes and end-to-end support.
contact.discord: Discord: Join the server, open a ticket and reach the Tismodev team. You can also click the button to fill the quick brief or reach me on Instagram.
contact.hosting: Included: free hosting on a subdomain. Paid custom domains (.com, .be, etc.) available on request.

benefits.title: What every Tismodev project includes
benefits.hostingDesc: Delivery with free hosting on a subdomain. Optional custom domains (.com, .be, .fr, .net, .xyz, etc.) available for a low add-on fee.
benefits.seoDesc: Minimal technical SEO included for indexing. Optional low-cost SEO boost available to target top rankings.

options.title: Popular services

options.site: Modern marketing site + custom .com domain and advanced SEO
options.portfolio: Website redesign or domain placement + SEO
